name: ai-music-platform
description: AI-powered music creation and exploration platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "python manage.py runserver" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: python manage.py test && cd frontend && npm test
scripts.populate: python manage.py populate_compositions && python manage.py populate_streaming
scripts.setup: pip install -r requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install

author: AI Music Platform Team
